reviews.review_msg: Amazing prof. never thought a three hour lecture would be so enjoyable. She is very nice and her exams are pretty fare. Study her lecture notes and you're fine.

Megan is one of the best profs I've ever had. She's younger and that somehow makes lectures tolerable even though they're 3 hours long. Attendance is necessary because there are 3 group discussions throughout the semester and you don't know when they are. Her exams are not hard, study the slides and you'll be fine.
